SEARCH
Package executor.service.mapper

Interface StepMapper

public interface StepMapper
Mapper interface for converting Step entities to corresponding DTOs.

The StepMapper interface is annotated with Mapper from MapStruct, indicating that it is a mapper component with Spring integration. It defines methods for converting instances of Step entities to DTOs.

When using this mapper, ensure that the appropriate dependencies and configurations are in place, and the generated methods meet the requirements of the application.

See Also:
  • Mapper
  • Step

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StepResultResponse
    stepResultToStepResultResponse(StepResult stepResult)
    Converts a StepResult entity to a StepResultResponse DTO.

  • Method Details

    • stepResultToStepResultResponse

      StepResultResponse stepResultToStepResultResponse(StepResult stepResult)
      Converts a StepResult entity to a StepResultResponse DTO.

      This method is responsible for converting an instance of StepResult to the corresponding StepResultResponse DTO. It is annotated with Mapping to specify the mapping configuration between the source and target properties.

      The properties "action" and "value" of the StepResult entity are mapped to the corresponding properties in the StepResultResponse DTO.

      It is important to verify that the source and target properties are compatible and that the mapping process aligns with the requirements of the application. If nested objects or additional configurations are needed, additional mappings or annotations may be required.

      Parameters:
      stepResult - The StepResult entity to be converted.
      Returns:
      A StepResultResponse DTO representing the converted result.
      See Also:
      • Mapping
      • StepResult
      • StepResultResponse
